papers.author: Shubh Laddha, Lucas Changbencharoen, Win Kuptivej, Surya Shringla, Archana Vaidheeswaran, Yash Bhaskar

papers.author: Pavel Chernakov, Sasan Jafarnejad, Rapha\"el Frank

papers.author: Guillem Rodr\'iguez-Corominas, Maria J. Blesa, Christian Blum

papers.author: Zongzhe Xu, Zitao Shuai, Eideen Mozaffari, Ravi S. Aysola, Rajesh Kumar, Yuzhe Yang

papers.author: Judah Goldfeder, Philippe Wyder, Yann LeCun, Ravid Shwartz Ziv

papers.author: Yihan (Logon),  Wen, Xin Chen
